VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total social media followers?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {@ApexAthletics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total social media followers?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {@IronwoodInvincibles}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is @ApexAthletics's maximum Social Media Followers in the streamgraph?

EVJ.Q: Which year is @CrimsonCometsOfficial's maximum Social Media Followers in the streamgraph?

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2006, did the total Social Media Followers experience a larger or smaller change than between 2000 and 2001?
NC.A: The change in total social media followers between 2000 and 2006 was {larger} than between 2000 and 2001.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2008, was the average total Social Media Followers higher or lower than between 2001 and 2007?
NC.A: The average total social media followers between 2000 and 2008 was {higher} than between 2001 and 2007.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2005, was the average total Social Media Followers higher or lower than between 2007 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total social media followers between 2001 and 2005 was {higher} than between 2007 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2005, did the total Social Media Followers experience a larger or smaller change than between 2001 and 2004?
NC.A: The change in total social media followers between 2001 and 2005 was {smaller} than between 2001 and 2004.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {@CrimsonCometsOfficial} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did @ApexAthletics and @CrimsonCometsOfficial first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: @ApexAthletics and @CrimsonCometsOfficial first exchanged leading positions in {2006}.
